name: Dinner for Two (Ramiro Almeida Basso)
description:
Hello everyone!

I've been quite away from game developing because I was feeling down, but I had to make something for GMTK GameJam 2020. The first day was really difficult, I spent 4 hours in my computer screen trying to come up with a good idea based on the theme (Out of Control) and got nothing. When I was about to give up I thought of the situation that most people have no control over: Dating.

The game is supposed to be a sattire on how we view dating as something that we need to do things in a specific way so that we can succeed as if it were some kind of game, when in reality it's all out of our control and the only thing we can do is control ourselves and hope for the best.

The game has 4 different endings and everything was done by me from scratch. I hope you all like it!

Controls:

W - Forward

S - Backward

A - Left

D - Right

E - Up

Q - Down

Mouse - Look Around

LMB - Interact
